edu.miracosta.cs113.printerQueue

Class PrintJob

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.miracosta.cs113.printerQueue.PrintJob

  • public class PrintJob
extends java.lang.Object
    PrintJob : model class that represents one print job of a specific page number.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PrintJob()
      Default constructor, creates a new print job and increments ID counter.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getID()
      getID returns ID of the print job
      int getNumPages()
      getNumPages returns number of pages of the print job
      static void resetIDCount()
      resetIDCount sets IDCount to 0
      void setNumPages(int numPages)
      setNumPages sets number of pages to the passed value
      java.lang.String toString()
      toString creates a string describing print job

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PrintJob

        public PrintJob()
        Default constructor, creates a new print job and increments ID counter. Chooses the number of pages randomly from 1 to 50.

    • Method Detail

        public int getID()
        getID returns ID of the print job

        integer representing ID of the job

        getNumPages returns number of pages of the print job

        setNumPages sets number of pages to the passed value
